text: Dadha is a 1994 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. G. Vishwambharan, starring Babu Antony and Charmila in the lead roles. The film has musical score by K. J. Joy. ==Cast== * Babu Antony as Bharathan * Charuhasan as Mashu * Shanthi Krishna as Devi *Narendra Prasad as Vettukadan *Rajan P. Dev as Velayudhan *Ajith Kollam as Raghavan *Shammi Thilakan as Anali Thoma *Sathyapriya as Padmakshi *Santhosh as Pappan *Mamukkoya as Moosa *Adoor Bhavani as Tea seller Lady *Seetha as Sharada *Kalpana as Anandam *Jose Pellissery as Devassya *Azeez as SI *MS Thrippunithura as Balasundara Moorthy *Ashokan as Vijayan *V. K. Sriraman as CI Ravindran *Aboobecker as Musthafakka *Radha Ravi as Maruthupandi Thevar *Tony as Bharathan's friend ==Soundtrack== The music was composed by K. J. Joy and the lyrics were written by Shibu Chakravarthy. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! No. !! Song !! Singers !! Length (m:ss) |- | 1 || "Aayiram Maathalappookkal" || K. J. Yesudas, K. S. Chithra, Chorus || |- | 2 || "Mugdhahaasam" || K. J. Yesudas || |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by P. G. Viswambharan
